version_description: Minor bug fix

◎ Improved voice coach accuracy when device is locked!
◎ New locking mechanism to prevent mis-clicks during workouts
◎ Improvements and optimization for Apple Watch support!
◎ Brand new skins you can earn for free by unlocking achievements!

Thank you to our community of millions and millions of runners! We hope you love this update. If you haven't already, please join our amazing community of over 100,000 likes and 1000 personal success photos on Facebook.com/c25kfree. Meet other amazing individuals who are also starting the program or seek advice from the wonderfully helpful veterans who have finished. Join our active forums at forums.zenlabsfitness.com for any questions and help with getting started.

For support, contact us anytime! We answer each and every single email. contactus@zenlabsfitness.com

◎ Improvements and optimization

◎ Now you can track your calories and distance for each workout! Tap the center dial to cycle through your stats!
◎ Apple Music Integration! You can now listen to all your favorite music as well as get hand selected playlists! Stream your favorite songs and listen to unlimited radio!
◎ Voice alerts optimization

◎ Now you can track your calories and distance for each workout! Tap the center dial to cycle through your stats!

■ HUGE UPDATE!
■ BRAND NEW UI

Thank you for making Zen Labs Fitness and C25K® the #1 running community!

≈ Cleaner UI ≈
◎ Less is more! We've cleaned out the bloat and made our app even easier to use
◎ Easier access to music controls
◎ Simple and refined UI. We've spent hundreds of hours to carefully curate this app to everything you need and remove everything you don't

≈ Optimized for latest iOS ≈
◎ Faster loading
◎ Improved voice alerts

◎ NEW map feature to see your run route! Just finish your workout as normal and you will see the new feature at the end! Enjoy! :)
◎ Updated consent screen regarding privacy and data

Zen Labs LLC believes privacy is a fundamental human right, so every Zen Labs product is designed to minimize the collection and use of your data and provide transparency and control over your information. Please see our privacy policy. http://www.zenlabsfitness.com/privacy-policy/
